title: Masumabad, Dorudzan
text: Masumabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Ma‘şūmābād; also known as Gūrān-e Ma‘şūmābād) is a village in <a href="Abarj%20Rural%20District">Abarj Rural District</a>, <a href="Dorudzan%20District">Dorudzan District</a>, <a href="Marvdasht%20County">Marvdasht County</a>, <a href="Fars%20Province">Fars Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 200, in 39 families.
